Our Services

Medical & IOT devices solutions

We take ideas to the manufacturable product by producing proof of concept, prototypes, the product for engineering and design validation , and validating design for safety and performance compliance standards.

New Sensor Development

Having tools and expertise in acoustics, bio-signals, optics, magnetic-field, we can develop custom sensors to meet specific requirements of your application.

Algorithm Development

Having experience and expertise in algorithm development, we can process raw data, analyze and extract meaningful information using signal processing and machine learning techniques.

Automated Test Fixtures

We develop electronics and software for automated test fixtures to do the functional quality test of the product in manufacturing at the assembly line.
